com.bobman159.rundml.core.expressions

Interface IStringExpression

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICaseWhenValue, IExpressionNode, ISQLType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StringExpression

    public interface IStringExpression
extends IExpressionNode
    SQL String expression such as concatenation in an SQL expression.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IStringExpression concat(ISQLType rightExpr)
      Define a concatenation operation between an SQL String and a Column
      IStringExpression concat(java.lang.String rightExpr)
      Define a concatenation operation between two SQLStrings SQLStrings are automatically escaped with ''

      • Methods inherited from interface com.bobman159.rundml.core.expressions.IExpressionNode

        getLeftExpr, getOperator, getRightExpr, setRightExpr

      • Methods inherited from interface com.bobman159.rundml.core.sql.types.ISQLType

        getType

    • Method Detail

      • concat

        IStringExpression concat(java.lang.String rightExpr)
        Define a concatenation operation between two SQLStrings SQLStrings are automatically escaped with ''

        example : SQLTypeFactory.getInstance().constant("abc").concat("def") =< "'abcdef'"

        Parameters:
        rightExpr - the string to the right of the concat operator
        Returns:
        An expression representing the concatenated strings

      • concat

        IStringExpression concat(ISQLType rightExpr)
        Define a concatenation operation between an SQL String and a Column

        ex : Column col1 = new Column("Col01",Types.CHAR);

        colLhs.concat("def") =< COL01 || 'def'

        Parameters:
        rightExpr - the column to the right of the concat operator
        Returns:
        An expression representing the concatenated strings
